Program Name: COMPUTER NETWORK AND INTERNET SECURITY ENGINEER DIPLOMA


1. Program Pre-Requisites:

- 18 years or older

- Post-secondary degree in I.T., computer sciences or equivalent

      - ESL results as indicated:


Program Length:
      76 weeks , full-time only.

Program Cost: CDN. (includes tuition, fees, books/software)
      TOTAL COST:


English Proficiency Requirements (For ESL students):
   A minimum TOEFL score of 550
   OR an IELTS score of 6.0, with no band less than 5.0
   OR completion of the BizTech Entrance English Level 3 for people with no English test results

   We are a designated learning institution with the Canadian Government, #019304029082.

   *Program Cost indicates the post-secondary program ONLY. These amounts do not include the study permit fee, or living costs while attending school.

International Admission Steps:
   Step 1 - application is made to the school (there is a $100 fee), including your pre-requisites documents for consideration: identification, official copy transcripts/accreditations; ESL results are required.
   Step 2 - upon consideration, the college will issue a 'Letter of Offer' to the applicant, it contains program details and an invoice for the program's first year;
   Step 3 - the college will issue its international student acceptance letter once:
   - When 25% of your program fees have been submitted
